emailTemplate.subject: Learning more about {job_title} at {company_name}
emailTemplate.body:
I hope this email finds you well.  I just recently saw a posting for a {job_title} position at {company_name} + and would love to learn more.  My experience with React.js, C#, and Java feels like a great fit for the role.

Could you tell me more about the software development team and what it's like to work for the company?I believe you would have great insight as a {title} for {company_name}.

I appreciate any information you could provide, looking forward to hearing from you!
